cz.ive.gui
Class ZoomScrollPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  cz.ive.gui.AnimatedPanel
                      cz.ive.gui.ZoomScrollPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Gui, Subwindow, Viewpoint, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
Direct Known Subclasses:
GraphAreaPanel, HiLODPanel
public abstract class ZoomScrollPanel
extends AnimatedPanel
implements Viewpoint

Skeleton implementation of GUI panel that can be zoomed and scrolled.

Author:
Ondra
See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

getPanel

public javax.swing.JPanel getPanel()
Description copied from class: AnimatedPanel
Retrives root panel of this Subwindow. It is not necessarilly this class, for example in case that we use some ToolBars and other controls. So whenever the Subwindow component is to be added to some container, the panel return by this call should be added instead of instance of this class.

Specified by:
getPanel in interface Subwindow
Overrides:
getPanel in class AnimatedPanel
Returns:
root panel of this GUI component

public abstract IveObject getObjectAtPosition(java.awt.Point point,
                                              boolean acceptWP)
Retrieves object under the given point (ignoring transparency in GIFs)

Parameters:
point - Point to be searched.
acceptWP - do we accept also the WayPoints?
Returns:
IveObject (even a WayPoint, under the point)

performShortcutAction

public void performShortcutAction(java.awt.event.MouseEvent ev)
Performs shorcut action (a implicit action) on the selected object. We only perform implicit action on Areas, where we show the area in the new Tab.

Parameters:
ev - Mouse event that provoked the ShortcutAction.

showSelectedObjectMenu

Shows popup menu with some action appropriate for the selected object. This method uses the simulation lock.
